For other concerns, please create a ticket via the Tamaraw Easy Assist Hub (TEAH)

Queries will be accommodated from Mondays to Fridays, 8:00 am to 3:30 pm ONLY.

Ground Floor, Administration Building, Nicanor Reyes St. Sampaloc, Manila 1015

A tuition installment plan is available with our financial services partner Bukas.
